js.lib: jquery datatables staterestore buttons searchbuilder datetime

dt-example.title: Don't save SearchBuilder
dt-example.info: This example shows how to use the `-init stateRestore.searchBuilder` initialisation option to disable the saving of the table's current `-init searchBuilder` search queries by setting the value of the initialisation option to `false`. The default value is `true` meaning that the searchBuilder search queries will be saved.
